Text:
Guys, this is absolutely THE BEST no crack way to unlock licensed aircraft. Most publishers (besides lamicus Abacus) only apply anti piracy protection to the main gauges, PFD and MFD, for example. Well since ISG offers an instrument package that replaces the primary displays...you do the math.

An earlier version of this package got the Level-D 767 working for me years before DCrack came along. max must have found this version the same place I did and saved me the trouble of sharing it here, enjoy.
Ive got CaptainSim - 777 Captain v0.2 Beta .exe,which is extractable but cant see the displays and no landing gear.So if anyone wants to have a closer look at it,leave a comment and ill up it.
MickyFinny, can you be so kind to upload that CS 777?  Thanks...
i need latest update,PLEESE crack the latest update!thanx a lot!
